blogPost.excerpt: Meet the tech startups that raised outside funding in 2020 The full report features: 💻 Over 6,300 tech startups 💰 Details covering their raise ✔️ 8,610 verified email addresses
blogPost.body: Meet the tech startups that raised outside funding in 2020 The full report features: 💻 Over 6,300 tech startups 💰 Details covering their raise ✔️ 8,610 verified email addresses
blogPost.title: Global Startup Report - Find out what startups got funded in 2020
blogPost.author: Andrew Kamphey

localize.description: 迎接2020年筹集外部资金的科技创业公司 完整报告的特点是。💻超过6,300家科技创业公司 💰涵盖其融资的细节 ✔️8,610个经过验证的电子邮件地址。
localize.tagline: 了解2020年有哪些创业公司获得了融资

localize.description: 迎接2020年籌集外部資金的科技創業公司 完整報告的特點是。💻超過6,300家科技創業公司 💰涵蓋其融資的細節 ✔️8,610個經過驗證的電子郵件地址。
localize.tagline: 瞭解2020年有哪些創業公司獲得了融資

previous.excerpt: Ojoy enlarges low-resolution photos and memoji and improves their quality. It does this 100% in the browser client-side, thanks to some smarts from Upscaler and TensorFlow.js. The output is typically sharper compared to just resizing them.
previous.title: Ojoy - Enlarge low-resolution images and improve their quality

localize.description: Ojoy可以放大低分辨率的照片和备忘录，并提高其质量。由于 Upscaler 和 TensorFlow.js 的一些智能，它 100% 在浏览器客户端实现了这一点。与仅仅调整它们的大小相比，输出的图像通常更加清晰。
localize.tagline: 放大低分辨率图像并提高其质量。

localize.description: Ojoy可以放大低分辨率的照片和備忘錄，並提高其質量。由於 Upscaler 和 TensorFlow.js 的一些智能，它 100% 在瀏覽器客戶端實現了這一點。與僅僅調整它們的大小相比，輸出的圖像通常更加清晰。
localize.tagline: 放大低分辨率圖像並提高其質量。

next.excerpt: http://www.crikle.com is a web-based sales solution that combines video calling with customised sales guidance and actionable information capture, to sell quickly. Less admin, more sales. Everything your team needs to convert more customers, faster.
next.title: Crikle - Sell more from anywhere

localize.description: http://www.crikle.com 是基于网络的销售解决方案，将视频通话与定制化的销售指导和可操作的信息采集相结合，快速销售。减少管理，增加销售。您的团队所需的一切，以更快地转化更多的客户。
http://www.crikle.com 是基於網絡的銷售解決方案，將視頻通話與定製化的銷售指導和可操作的信息採集相結合，快速銷售。減少管理，增加銷售。您的團隊所需的一切，以更快地轉化更多的客戶。
